pages.text:
.entry-header
About Us
Locally Owned
ESTABLISHED 2004
The Therien family started in the restaurant business in 1971. The first Banana Boat opened in September 1971, in Fort Lauderdale, on Commercial Blvd east of U.S.1. John Therien and his sons, Pierre, Luke and Gilles, moved the Banana Boat to Boynton Beach in 1978, on Ocean Avenue and the Intracoastal Waterway.
Prime Catch opened on June 1, 2004 to rave reviews. Zagat rated Prime Catch “Best New Restaurant in Palm Beach County” after its first year. Restaurant reviews have continued to praise Prime Catch for being the first important fine dining destination to arrive in Boynton Beach. Prime Catch is known to have the freshest fish in the area, along with a new approach to flavors and ambiance.
The Theriens are completely dedicated to the restaurant business. They support the community through fundraisers, the Chamber of Commerce, and are loyal to their customers, staff, and vendor partners.
General Manager
Amy Potter
Amy Potter began with Prime Catch in May 2016. She worked as a Server, then Captain,
then quickly moved into Management. Amy has been General Manager since 2023.
Amy grew up in Wooster, Ohio, and Graduated from the University of Cincinnati. Amy’s first career took her into Retail Fashion, as a Buyer.
Amy’s energy level eventually pulled her away from Retail Buying, and into the Hospitality
business. She began by working and learning in the corporate chains while steadily moving
into Upscale Dining. Amy’s appreciation of high-end wines motivated her to work full-time as a Wine Consultant for three years, before getting back into upscale hospitality.
After moving to Boynton Beach in 1999, she and her husband were frequent “Sunday Brunch”
guests at Prime Catch. It just felt natural to her that in 2016 she would become a
team member at Prime Catch. Amy’s past experience in the wine industry has helped
Prime Catch to develop an outstanding wine program. And Amy’s passion for M’aitre D’ style
hospitality ensures that every Guest has a memorable dining experience.
Let's Eat
Open Lunch & Dinner Daily
Be inspired by our award winning, certified culinary chef and his staff.
Be pampered by our highly trained, professional staff.
Reservations
Prime Catch Restaurant
700 East Woolbright Road
Boynton Beach, FL 33435
561-737-8822
Open Daily
Sun-Thu: 11:00am-9:00pm
Fri-Sat:
11:00am-10:00pm

.entry-header
Contact Us
Have feedback?
If you have any comments or suggestions, please feel free to send us a message below.
Open Daily
Sun-Thu: 11:00am-9:00pm
Fri-Sat:
11:00am-10:00pm
700 East Woolbright Road, Boynton Beach, FL 33435
561-737-8822
First Name
*
Last Name
*
Email Address
*
Your Message
CAPTCHA
Email
This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.
Want to work at Prime Catch?
If you are interested in a position now, the best thing to do is call
561-737-8822
and ask for a Manager. Tell them you are looking for that particular position. They will tell you if it is available. Then print out the application from this website, and bring it in already filled out, along with your resume if you have one, and references, if you have them.
The following positions become available weekly, monthly or seasonally depending on availability:
MANAGER, HOSTESS, SERVER, BARTENDER, BUSSER, FOOD RUNNER, KITCHEN MANAGER, LINE COOK, PREP COOK, DISHWASHER.
Print Application
Bring application to us OR submit online
here
.
